text: Against this background must be taken Mr. Kaunda's repeated statements that all say that I don't accept his good faith." He said Mr. Kaunda must know that his statements had stimulated violence, but he had done nothing to stop it.
handwritten_text: Against this background must be taken Mr. Kaunda's repeated statements that all say that I don't accept his good faith." He said Mr. Kaunda must know that his statements had stimulated violence, but he had done nothing to stop it.
